Header.title: Your fruit our prediction
Header.paragraph: Validate each and every fruit you consume.

About.paragraph: We were just wandering and wrangling various datasets on which we can explore and learn we came across various different datasets.But the one we found promising is the fruits dataset from kaggle and we started building our project.
Why2: We will have to try various models in the future.

Features.title: Everyday Usecase
Features.text: In day to day life we come across very few healthy options and fruits is amongst the most healthy option available.

Features.title: Validate
Features.text: Validate every fruit you eat to avoid harmful effects on your body and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

Features.title: Portable
Features.text: As the idea is for web app only we can also put support for fruit detection devices and link to our API.

Features.title: Deep Learning
Features.text: We have applied various deep learning models and tried to take out the best but we can improve much more by trying out various models.
